    • Molecular Generator: (Donor-Acceptor Systems)¶

    Concatenates molecular cply files based on connectivity tags to generate input files for Gaussian . See Examples

    Files and directories¶

    • BuildingBlocks repos: must contain the directories

      • acceptors
      • donors
      • functional_groups spacers
      • terminals

    The backbone of the molecule can be composed of acceptors, spacers or donors, and can be decorated with molecules from the functional_groups directory and terminated with molecules from the terminals directory. Run

    python ../da_builder/donoracceptorsystems.py -h

    to see a list of the options
